title: Concept Mapping Workshop on Business Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Organizational Communication Understanding and Workplace Environment Experience
context.additional_context: Operating a smartphone-based LMS environment with non-real-time video lectures and mobile-friendly assignment submission systems

learning_goals: Learners can structure the functions of various organizational communication channels into a concept map
Learners can analyze verbal/written communication strategies for business scenarios using concept mapping techniques
Learners can propose teamwork improvement plans in the form of a visualized concept map proposal

resources: Mobile-friendly collaboration tool (e.g., Google Draw alternative app)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
